verses.verse: These <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> spoke; <S%G2980><s%> and lifting <S%G1869><s%> up His eyes <S%G3788><s%> to heaven, <S%G3772><s%> He said, <S%G3004><s%> "Father, <S%G3962><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> has come; <S%G2064><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> Thy Son, <S%G5207><s%> that the Son <S%G5207><s%> may glorify <S%G1392><s%> Thee,

even <S%G2531><s%> as Thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> Him authority <S%G1849><s%> over all <S%G3956><s%> mankind, <S%G4561><s%> that to all <S%G3956><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Him, He may give <S%G1325><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life. <S%G2222><s%>

"And this <S%G3778><s%> is eternal <S%G166><s%> life, <S%G2222><s%> that they may know <S%G1097><s%> Thee, the only <S%G3441><s%> true <S%G228><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> and Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast sent. <S%G649><s%>
"I glorified <S%G1392><s%> Thee on the earth, <S%G1093><s%> having accomplished <S%G5048><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me to do. <S%G4160><s%>

"And now, <S%G3568><s%> glorify <S%G1392><s%> Thou Me together <S%G3844><s%> with Thyself, <S%G4572><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> with the glory <S%G1391><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I had <S%G2192><s%> with Thee before <S%G4253><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> was.

"I manifested <S%G5319><s%> Thy name <S%G3686><s%> to the men <S%G444><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> Me out of the world; <S%G2889><s%> Thine <S%G4771><s%> they were, and Thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> them to Me, and they have kept <S%G5083><s%> Thy word. <S%G3056><s%>
"Now <S%G3568><s%> they have come to know <S%G1097><s%> that everything <S%G3956><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me is from Thee;

for the words <S%G4487><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Thou gavest <S%G1325><s%> Me I have given <S%G1325><s%> to them; and they received <S%G2983><s%> [them,] and truly <S%G230><s%> understood <S%G1097><s%> that I came <S%G1831><s%> forth <S%G1831><s%> from Thee, and they believed <S%G4100><s%> that Thou didst send <S%G649><s%> Me.

"I ask <S%G2065><s%> on their behalf; <S%G4012><s%> I do not ask <S%G2065><s%> on behalf <S%G4012><s%> of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but of those whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me; for they are Thine; <S%G4771><s%>
and all <S%G3956><s%> things <S%G3956><s%> that are Mine <S%G1699><s%> are Thine, <S%G4674><s%> and Thine <S%G4674><s%> are Mine; <S%G1699><s%> and I have been glorified <S%G1392><s%> in them.

"And I am <S%G1510><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> more <S%G3765><s%> in the world; <S%G2889><s%> and [yet] they themselves <S%G846><s%> are in the world, <S%G2889><s%> and I come <S%G2064><s%> to Thee. Holy <S%G40><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> keep <S%G5083><s%> them in Thy name, <S%G3686><s%> [the name] which <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me, that they may be one, <S%G1520><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as We [are.]

"While <S%G3753><s%> I was with them, I was keeping <S%G5083><s%> them in Thy name <S%G3686><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me; and I guarded <S%G5442><s%> them, and not one <S%G3762><s%> of them perished <S%G622><s%> but the son <S%G5207><s%> of perdition, <S%G684><s%> that the Scripture <S%G1124><s%> might be fulfilled. <S%G4137><s%>

"But now <S%G3568><s%> I come <S%G2064><s%> to Thee; and these <S%G3778><s%> things <S%G3778><s%> I speak <S%G2980><s%> in the world, <S%G2889><s%> that they may have <S%G2192><s%> My joy <S%G5479><s%> made <S%G4137><s%> full <S%G4137><s%> in themselves. <S%G1438><s%>

"I have given <S%G1325><s%> them Thy word; <S%G3056><s%> and the world <S%G2889><s%> has hated <S%G3404><s%> them, because <S%G3754><s%> they are not of the world, <S%G2889><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as I am <S%G1510><s%> not of the world. <S%G2889><s%>
"I do not ask <S%G2065><s%> Thee to take <S%G142><s%> them out of the world, <S%G2889><s%> but to keep <S%G5083><s%> them from the evil <S%G4190><s%> [one.]
"They are not of the world, <S%G2889><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as I am <S%G1510><s%> not of the world. <S%G2889><s%>
"Sanctify <S%G37><s%> them in the truth; <S%G225><s%> Thy word <S%G3056><s%> is truth. <S%G225><s%>
"As Thou didst send <S%G649><s%> Me into the world, <S%G2889><s%> I also <S%G2532><s%> have sent <S%G649><s%> them into the world. <S%G2889><s%>
"And for their sakes <S%G5228><s%> I sanctify <S%G37><s%> Myself, <S%G1683><s%> that they themselves <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> may be sanctified <S%G37><s%> in truth. <S%G225><s%>

"I do not ask <S%G2065><s%> in behalf <S%G4012><s%> of these <S%G3778><s%> alone, <S%G3441><s%> but for those <S%G3588><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> who believe <S%G4100><s%> in Me through <S%G1223><s%> their word; <S%G3056><s%>

that they may all <S%G3956><s%> be one; <S%G1520><s%> even <S%G2531><s%> as Thou, Father, <S%G3962><s%> [art] in Me, and I in Thee, that they also <S%G2532><s%> may be in Us; that the world <S%G2889><s%> may believe <S%G4100><s%> that Thou didst send <S%G649><s%> Me.

"And the glory <S%G1391><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me I have given <S%G1325><s%> to them; that they may be one, <S%G1520><s%> just <S%G2531><s%> as We are one; <S%G1520><s%>

I in them, and Thou in Me, that they may be perfected <S%G5048><s%> in unity, <S%G1520><s%> that the world <S%G2889><s%> may know <S%G1097><s%> that Thou didst send <S%G649><s%> Me, and didst love <S%G25><s%> them, even <S%G2531><s%> as Thou didst love <S%G25><s%> Me.

"Father, <S%G3962><s%> I desire <S%G2309><s%> that they also, <S%G2548><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me, be with Me where <S%G3699><s%> I am, <S%G1510><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that they may behold <S%G2334><s%> My glory, <S%G1391><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> Thou hast given <S%G1325><s%> Me; for Thou didst love <S%G25><s%> Me before <S%G4253><s%> the foundation <S%G2602><s%> of the world. <S%G2889><s%>

"O righteous <S%G1342><s%> Father, <S%G3962><s%> although <S%G2532><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> has not known <S%G1097><s%> Thee, yet <S%G1161><s%> I have known <S%G1097><s%> Thee; and these <S%G3778><s%> have known <S%G1097><s%> that Thou didst send <S%G649><s%> Me;

and I have made <S%G1107><s%> Thy name <S%G3686><s%> known <S%G1107><s%> to them, and will make <S%G1107><s%> it known; <S%G1107><s%> that the love <S%G26><s%> wherewith <S%G3739><s%> Thou didst love <S%G25><s%> Me may be in them, and I in them. "
